member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_OUTPUT_HISTOGRAM
member.summary: Represents the histogram output buffer for a single component.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_OUTPUT_HISTOGRAM.Offset
member.summary: The offset location in pBuffer to write the component histogram. Must be 256-byte aligned. Set to zero when a component is disabled.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_OUTPUT_HISTOGRAM.pBuffer
member.summary: And representing the target buffer for hardware to write the components histogram. Set to a nullptr when the component histogram is disabled.
